msg: HDFS-1606. Provide a stronger data guarantee in the write pipeline by adding a new datanode when an existing datanode failed.

author: trawick
msg: for MinGW, hard-code the results of various IPv6 tests instead
of butchering them enough to work with Winsock.
Use --disable-ipv6 if not desired, or running on ancient machine.
